abstract.text: Read and write compressed files and linear PCM audio files using a simplified interface.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: Extended Audio File Services provides simplified audio file access, combining features of Audio File Services and Audio Converter Services. It provides a unified interface for reading and writing compressed as well as linear PCM audio files.

abstract.text: Record or play audio, convert formats, parse audio streams, and configure your audio session.

doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentati.title: Property Identifiers for Extended Audio File Objects

An opaque structure representing an extended audio file object.

Wraps an audio file object in an extended audio file object.

Perform an asynchronous, sequential write operation on an audio file.
Get information about audio file formats, and about files containing audio data.
Read or write a variety of audio data to or from disk or a memory buffer.
Parse streamed audio files as the data arrives on the user’s computer.
Access information about audio formats and codecs.
Parse the structure of Core Audio files.
